column4: hi all. is there a special channel for unity development available?
#ayatana
if you dont know how,, where you type here,, just type   /join #ayatana

mtpaint takes screenshots for one
here is a link to read   http://www.lubuntutips.com/2011/12/lubuntu-screenshots.html#.UJY9yXZhNTM

I am installing it now to test
that was for you
mm,, I know compiz has a cool screenshot tool ,, drag over the area to be captured,, and gimp,, also,, gimp 2.8 but you need a PPA  for that

it works fine in gimp,, and fast  and it opens immediately in gimp for edition
editing rather

ah ok
for screen shots?  no  unless it can install a windows screenshot tool which i wouldnt recommend
you can reinstall lubuntu-desktop    .. did you use  sudo apt-get remove scrot  ?
